price: តើពួកគេបានបង្កើតមេឃជាច្រើនជាន់ និងផែនដីនេះឬ? ផ្ទុយទៅវិញ ពួកគេគ្មានជំនឿពិតប្រាកដឡើយ។
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
